title: Can you name the anime based on the poor description?

Girl is student council president and harsh on boys but works at a maid cafe and is teased by this boy that has eyes for only her.

Boy and his best friend are separated by vampires and boy is a vampire hunter while best friend is a vampire
Boy gets stuck in game and if he dies in game. He dies in real life and he falls in love with a girl that is good at cooking
